instructions: On your phone or tablet, open the YouTube app. Sign in to the Google Account you'd like to start your membership on. Select your profile picture Start your free trial (if you're eligible). Otherwise, tap Get YouTube Premium.

On your phone or tablet, open the YouTube Music app. Sign in to the Google Account you'd like to start your membership on. Select your profile picture. Start your free trial (if you're eligible). Otherwise, tap Get Music Premium.
